videos.projectOverview: Developed a comprehensive full-stack web application for a client to enhance their online presence and digital marketing capabilities.

technicalImplementationHighlights: Created a custom video player component to showcase client's portfolio
Integrated AWS Lambda functions to develop a seamless 'Request a Quote' form
Implemented secure API calls to enhance user interaction and data collection
Utilized MongoDB to develop a dynamic image gallery with backend database integration
Deployed the website on AWS, configuring domain settings and implementing SSL security protocols

videos.projectOutcome: Successfully delivered a professional, fully functional website that improved the client's online visibility and provided an intuitive user experience. The project showcased the ability to combine technical expertise with strategic digital marketing approaches.
